availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Washington Lewis (Jefferson County, Kentucky, river man and assistant grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, river man and assistant grocer. Kentucky native. Son of James Lewis and Martha Lewis. Student in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. River man in Jefferson County in 1860. Employed by Marshall Woodson as an assistant grocer in Jefferson County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
_Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States _(1850), Population Schedules, Jefferson County, Louisville District 3, p. 252A.
_Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States _(1860), Population Schedules, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 150.
KYR-0001-020-2149.
